resources.string: Q: Which package needs to be imported so that you can accept user input?;java.util;java.awt;java.awt.event;java.io;Answer: Option D@Q: Which of the following GUI components can be included in a Java frame?;textbox;label;textbox, label, button, images;button;Answer: Option C@Q: Which of the following can be used to access the first element of an array named arrOne?;arrOne[0];arrOne[1];arrOne[3];arrOne[2];Answer: Option A@Q: What is the difference between a try-catch block and a try-catch-finally block?;try-catch contains code to execute if an error occurs or not, while try-catch-finally works the same way as try-catch block with the addition of a set of code that will execute whether an error occurs or not.;try-catch contains code to execute whether an arror occurs or not, try-catch-finally contains code to execute only if an error occurs;Same thing, different names;try-catch contains code to execute only if an error occurs, try-catch-finally contains code to execute whether an occurs or not;Answer: Option B@Q: What kind of data will this variable store - char fName;A single character;Text string;Numeric;true/false value;Answer: Option A@Q: Which keyword would you use if you wanted a class to use an interface?;main();implements;new;extends;Answer: Option B@Q: Which Java exception should be used to handle input/output errors?;InputException;NoSuchMethodException;ArithmeticException;IOException;Answer: Option D

Q: How long is an IPv6 address?;32 bits;128 bytes;64 bits;128 bits;Answer: Option D@Q: What flavor of Network Address Translation can be used to have one IP address allow many users to connect to the global Internet?;NAT;Static;Dynamic;PAT;Answer: Option D@Q: What are the two main types of access control lists (ACLs)? 1.Standard, 2.IEEE, 3.Extended, 4.Specialized;A-1 and 3;B-2 and 4;3 and 4;1 and 2;Answer: Option A@Q: What command is used to create a backup configuration?;copy running backup;copy running-config startup-config;config mem;wr mem;Answer: Option B@Q: You have 10 users plugged into a hub running 10Mbps half-duplex. There is a server connected to the switch running 10Mbps half-duplex as well. How much bandwidth does each host have to the server?;100 kbps;1 Mbps;2 Mbps;10 Mbps;Answer: Option D@Q: To back up an IOS, what command will you use?;backup IOS disk;copy ios tftp;copy tftp flash;copy flash tftp;Answer: Option D@Q: Which of the following is the valid host range for the subnet on which the IP address 192.168.168.188 255.255.255.192 resides?;192.168.168.129-190;192.168.168.129-191;192.168.168.128-190;192.168.168.128-192;Answer: Option A@Q: What protocol does PPP use to identify the Network layer protocol?;NCP;ISDN;HDLC;LCP;Answer: Option A@Q: Which of the following commands will allow you to set your Telnet password on a Cisco router?;line telnet 0 4;line aux 0 4;line vty 0 4;line con 0;Answer: Option C@Q: Which protocol does DHCP use at the Transport layer?;IP;TCP;UDP;ARP;Answer: Option C
